xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/76653-Anathema: A Moment In Time 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/vxVKSEBCqbLuPmJMKIprJzsGUUl.jpg This DVD features a fantastic performance at Metalmania Festival in March 2006. The band brilliantly perfoms their "The best of" setlist, as well as the Pink Floyd cover "Comfortably Numb". Also featured is a guest performance by Bacchus String Quartet. Anathema: A Moment In Time
